name: RefreshInsightSharing
description:
Refresh the sharing settings of an insight.

Use this tool to refresh the sharing settings for a specific insight within a project. This is useful when access permissions or sharing parameters need to be updated to reflect the latest configurations.

parameters.name: insight_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier for the insight to refresh sharing settings.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The Project ID to access. Retrieve it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: insight_sharing_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details like creation timestamp, enabled status, access token, settings, and password requirements for refreshing insight sharing.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
